the English Cocker is merry and affectionate , of equable disposition , neither sluggish nor hyperactive , a willing worker a faithful and engaging companion .英国可卡犬是欢快而挚爱的狗、性格平静，既不慢吞吞的，也不过度亢奋，一个乐于工作，可靠而迷人的伴侣。

entry.tran: 心平气和的;性情温和的；平和的
entry.def: If you describe someone as equable, you mean that they are calm, cheerful, and fair with other people, even in difficult circumstances.

example.ex: He was a man of the most equable temper...
example.tran: 他是个脾气非常好的人。

example.ex: He was a fine person to work with and he was very equable and a patient man.
example.tran: 他是个非常平和而且有耐心的人，和他一起工作很愉快。

entry.def: An equable climate stays at an even temperature and has no sudden changes.

example.ex: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.
example.tran: 天气变得更加温和，粮食产量也已经提高。
